definition[0]: the same amount or number as you have just had, said etc
example[0]: What a fantastic lunch. I could eat the same again.
example[1]: Nearly as many again died from pneumonia.
example[2]: The amount of crime is about half as much again (=the same in addition to half that amount) as it was in 1973.
example[3]: ‘Another drink?’ ‘Yes, same again (=the same drink again), please.’
